name: Girls slap
description:
This is an exquisite fighting game for beautiful girls;
The classic fighting system ensures that you can get started easily;
At present, there are as many as 14 beautiful girl characters in the game;
For you who like beautiful girl characters or fighting games, this is a choice that can not be missed!

Game mode overview


1. Friend competition: invite friends to a friendly competition. Friendship is the first and competition is the second!
2. Arcade mode: fight with all kinds of AI, improve your skills and challenge your limits!

Follow up plan


1. More cool bodies and diversified scenes
2. More battle modes
3. Story mode: you can explore the stories of various characters in the game, understand their enmity, as well as the intrigues hidden behind the fighting competition.

More costumes and new characters are still in production, please look forward to it!
